CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1945, pg. 1, reads: " Honored - Capt. Charles B. Hall, honor guest at the Hill District's Independence Day celebration, stands up in one of the automobiles in the several-block-long parade held here Wednesday as throngs on the sidewalk cheered.  Captain Hall is seated between Senator Joseph M. Guffey and David Lawrence, Democratic candidate for mayor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Capt. Charles B. Hall standing in convertible car between Joseph M. Guffey and David L. Lawrence in Independence Day parade, with broadside on telephone pole in background advertising Louis Jordan at the Savoy, on Centre Avenue at Francis Street in front of YMCA, Hill District
